Package model

package model
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Bubble
    The Bubble class handles everything with the Hero's special ability, named the bubble.
    It begins at the hero, and grows covering the whole screen.
    Once it collides with an enemy, that enemy is bubbled.
    It is a dynamic object.
    DynamicObject
    DynamicObject is the game object like projectiles, hero, enemies, bubble and fruit.
    GameObject
    GameObjects are the objects on the controller.Game controller screen.
    Every GameObject has a velocity, acceleration, position, direction.
    It can be divided into two subclasses which are staticObject and DynamicObject since
    some of the object we don't need to handle the velocity and the collision.
    GameObjectFactory
    GameObjectFactory is for generating different object according to different signs on the maps.
    This class implements the Factory method design pattern.
    HighScore
    HighScore is for storing the player name and the total point they get.
